tweet: Finally a place to vent to say how very much I hate being a married single mom.  There must be others out there. Feel free to vent here!
DH, hanging one string on the garage and plugging it in by midnight on the 24th is NOT effective holiday decorating.  It's irritating.
Next time you want a BJ, maybe we can find an app for that on your iPhone.
My poor kids have been parented by Nick Jr. all day today. I feel like Carly/Sam/Freddy are my own children.  But can't afford to feed Sam.
I say Nick Jr. b/c even tho DH is home, I'm sure he's on his iPhone in the BR and not with the kids. Poor little darlings.   Or lucky...
